name: SUPREME CHICKEN SHOWDOWN
description:
THE VERY BEST OF CHICKEN SPORTS

Do you still play videogames with friends on the same couch and with two gamepads? Are you maybe a fellow developer who likes to battle a coworker during a break? Do you like a simple party challenge with great music and funny sound effects or are you a master of simple yet tactical arcade warfare?

- I think this short game might be for you!

Please have a lot of fun!

sIPX :)

FEATURING

  • A classic multiplayer experience
  • 3 breathtaking levels
  • 3 awesome theme songs and lots of chicken effects
  • 2 agile battle chickens
  • 1 dancing referee chicken
  • and 1 angry granny
